raw_body: GOONETILLEKE – PRIYA – The family regrets the passing of dearly beloved PRIYADHARSHINI MANGALIKA PERERA WIJESUNDERA GOONETILLEKE (Artist and Musician) – Daughter of late L P and Bertha Goonetilleke of Nadun Grove,​ Mt.Lavinia,​ sister of Ciranti Saluwadana,​ loving aunt of Nadi and Neraj,​ companion and dear friend of Drucille Gomes and family,​ cousin of Manel Shanmuganathan and family,​ Canada,​ cousins UK and Sri Lanka,​ passed away peacefully at her residence on 31st October 2023. Her remains lie at A.F. Raymond,​ Borella for visitation on Friday 3rd November from 8.30 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella on Saturday 4th November at 2 p.m.070319
